mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
Subway Surfers: Gameplay loop and monetization
- Subway Surfers is an endless runner game where the player tries to get a higher score as possible
- The game's soft currency ar coins, which can be picked up during runs, obtained via missions or purchased with real money
- Coins can be used to unlock characters, buy boosters or hoverboards or upgrade items
- Keys are harder to obtain than coins and they can be used for purchasing characters or reviving during a run
- During a run if the player is caught he can revive wither by watching an Ad or by using keys. The cost of key revives increases with each use
